I have one alternate account called MR.FANTASTIC#TEAMPYRO and is f2p and I don't trade on it.  ","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/5ffd3c89a32b3507865d24ddc314d35b ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":177,"locked":1,"creator_id":28,"modificator_id":28,"created_at":"05.08.2016 13:54:39","updated_at":"2016-08-05 21:47:57","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":9,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561197999059553 (-=KCSB=- KG)","alts":null,"description":"hey and well ban was long long time ago  right now 438 days and well i know i was stupid and i dont even know why i did it  maybe i was just stupid  i learned what i did wrong and i know i dont want to scamm <.< right now i dont trade much with strange people i only trade with close friends but i am banned on scrap.tf and marketplace.tf  at the time i was banned i was a donater of scrap.tf and now i cant use it anymore there are many websites i cant use anymore and i hate myself for this shit i did around 440 days ago the next reason is i cant play anymore on your servers without getting kicked when it is full i love the orange_x3 server but i always get kicked i feel bad for the shit i did at this time and i feel bad for the people i did it too but i dont want the tag anymore its a shame for my soul and for my heart its a shame in my life i mean playing tf2 is a part of my life  i play it since many years and have over 6100 hours in the game  i love the game and the people but they hate me cuz of the tag and i can understand it i hate myself to for the tag and for the shit i did at this time now after many days i may see the chance to get a downgrade or a remove so i can use scrap.tf or marketplace.tf again and can play on any server i want my profil and backpack will be always public so you can guys can see everything i did  the reason why i am that late with the appeal  i was just nervouse and i dont want to fail  i hope you can understand it and i will get a downgrade or a remove tf2 is just my love :c   ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":295,"locked":1,"creator_id":50,"modificator_id":50,"created_at":"17.08.2016 22:57:33","updated_at":"2016-08-23 23:41:06","state":"Archived","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Tio José das Vacas
"},{"id":23,"type":"Mistake - Admin misunderstood evidence or made a mistake","appellant":"76561198314496364 (Mama Ama Kriminal)","alts":null,"description":"I want to report fogs administrator opinion because he made mistake!! I got banned for nothing . When im inviting him on steam hes rejecting me i type in his comment that i need help about it but hes deleting it, i posted a topic and he rejected it for nothif :@ hes last reply was that selling accounts are not allowed and i didnot sold any accounts!!!! Also he said that give all accounts links wich i am using or used and i gave it and he banned me for nothing like a first one Just i want to ask Why is he rejecting me or banning me im giving all proofs saying that i call me in skype or use teamviewer i can show it live if he wants of course but he dont care about it !!! He banned me for nothing i mnot scammer!!!! And he gave me a title " fog scammer" i heared about fog yesterday lol -_- Just give me a reason banning me for nothing and rejecting my appeals?? I willnot stop posting appeals because i got ban for nothing!! www.f-o-g.trade/appeals/21 www.f-o-g.treade/appeals/22 [MENTION=2]Tio José das Vacas[/MENTION]‍ ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":226,"locked":1,"creator_id":90,"modificator_id":90,"created_at":"10.09.2016 18:04:22","updated_at":"2016-09-10 18:30:19","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":33,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198190270679 (DEJVVV CSGOPot.com)","alts":null,"description":"Hello i am here again after 163 days.In recent days, I am still pondering what I have caused.And if you still think about the same is not good so I decided to write to you if there is any solution to remove the ban.I want to be better human in this community as i was before.My account caused me great joy.I decided to confess that what I have done. I can do anything for my account. [b]I never scammed anyone but i was lying-[/b]that's my problem :) And sorry for my english :)","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":41,"locked":1,"creator_id":108,"modificator_id":108,"created_at":"21.09.2016 19:34:16","updated_at":"2016-09-21 21:01:28","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":39,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198258644332 (snbi.)","alts":null,"description":"Hello, my name is snbi. About 4 months ago, I was involved in helping a friend with brokering one of his 12 key unusuals, in which I scammed him. You can go and see this appeal I made the day after in which it got denied: http://forums.f-o-g.eu/threads/12184-steamrep-tag-removal-downgrade-ban-appeal-snbi.html I'm just here to hopefully get a downgrade from my "scammer" tag, to a "caution" tag. The only reason I'm asking for this is because I don't want to keep this negativity on my steamrep/other trading websites for any longer. Now I cannot change what I did in the past, which was foolish, but I can change change the future by making good decisions and trying to have a decent reputation among the community. I recently decided to come back to playing TF2 and start trying to trade again because I had quit due to having to focus more on my classes, home stuff, etc... Anyway, my point is that I have learned my lesson from scamming my friend, and would like to ask one of the moderators to hopefully view this post and downgrade my tag from "scammer", to "caution" Thank you for taking the time to read this for whoever got assigned this appeal. [b]-Snbi[/b]","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":59,"locked":1,"creator_id":120,"modificator_id":120,"created_at":"01.10.2016 00:20:25","updated_at":"2016-10-01 15:20:44","state":"Archived","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Tio José das Vacas
"},{"id":40,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198016938478 (GizMo)","alts":null,"description":"It has been about a year now since this happened and i made a big mistake from that. I have changed a lot and I feel bad for the person(s) i have tried scamming in the past. I have lost friends because of this and it was so long ago and i was dumb back then and didnt know what i was doing. I will never try scamming ever again i have seen the bad things that can happen from what i used to do. Have my word "I will never scam again in the C:S Community or anything on Steam". Thanks. - GizMo","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/5aed3b1fca4acca90102acgec770accf https://files.f-o-g.eu/b0ef8g4g145a8eee43af4615b24bf54d https://files.f-o-g.eu/89184c09fgedaa13dg1122cdcde502b2 https://files.f-o-g.eu/0cgfg4a5369e826e6847df1bb4ab1g84 https://files.f-o-g.eu/da93gacd2fb3caf6g343edfeadb5063b ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":216,"locked":1,"creator_id":121,"modificator_id":121,"created_at":"04.10.2016 07:45:38","updated_at":"2016-11-04 18:49:32","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":44,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198158102694 (Marakesh)","alts":null,"description":"[i]I realise I made a big mistake by impersonating a CS:GO Pin admin, I wouldn't ever do something like that again. I would like to be unbanned, I learnt my lesson of trying to scam someone, I never scammed anyone, that was my only and failed one. Have already made an appeal, didn't get approved, I still have hope...I cannot use reddit, csgolounge, any trade servers to trade my items on there because of the ban... All my alts got banned aswell, I never use them, forgot the password to them all. I really can't trade with the steamrep mark, I hope you can understand me. Will provide all the evidence from the time period when I got reported. This happened 269 days ago. I will give my promise that I will never cause problems related to Steam ever again. I'm very sorry once and for all. Made a big mistake doing that. It's been almost one full year with the tag.  I can't get over the fact that I'm marked on here.  I want to apologize to advicebanana especially. I'm very sorry for causing problems.[/i]","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/0cfe7476e7ca29gf4bd8eab52a7cga75 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":129,"locked":1,"creator_id":83,"modificator_id":83,"created_at":"08.10.2016 23:30:48","updated_at":"2016-10-09 10:34:43","state":"Archived","assignee":"

Tio José das Vacas

A while ago I got scammed by someone using the same scam, so I tried doing it to others.","evidence":"I never got any money from this scam, and I don't plan on scamming again. I just got mad because lost money, but the script is now taken down (screenshots).
